name: ABS (Australia)
desc: Australian Bureau of Statistics. Comprehensive indicators for Oceania.

name: Afrobarometer
desc: Standard public opinion microdata for African nations.

name: Bank of Canada
desc: Central bank and market rate database.

name: BIS Stats
desc: Bank for International Settlements banking and financial data.

name: BLS Data Portal
desc: Bureau of Labor Statistics data. Primary official source for US inflation.

name: CB Nigeria
desc: Central Bank of Nigeria financial data.

name: CE (Consumer Expenditure)
desc: Buying habits of American consumers via Interview and Diary methods.

name: CHARLS
desc: China Health and Retirement Longitudinal Study.

name: College Scorecard
desc: US Dept of Education college outcomes data.

name: FRED (St. Louis Fed)
desc: The primary source for US macroeconomic time series including GDP and inflation.
vars: Real GDP, CPI Inflation, Interest Rates

name: HILDA Australia
desc: Household, Income and Labour Dynamics Australia.

name: IMF WEO
desc: World Economic Outlook. Projections and historical data.

name: INE Spain
desc: Instituto Nacional de Estadística. Spain indicators.

name: INSEE France
desc: National Institute of Statistics for France.

name: IPUMS ATUS
desc: American Time Use Survey harmonized data.

name: IPUMS International
desc: Harmonized census microdata from over 100 countries.

name: IPUMS USA (ACS/Census)
desc: Harmonized American Community Survey & Census data.

name: JOLTS
desc: Job Openings and Labor Turnover Survey.

name: JSTAR
desc: Japanese Study of Aging and Retirement.

name: NBS China
desc: National Bureau of Statistics of China indicators.

name: NIPA (BEA)
desc: National Income and Product Accounts measuring US economic activity.

name: Opportunity Atlas
desc: Social mobility outcomes by census tract.

name: Opportunity Insights
desc: Aggregated tax data for mobility research.

name: RBI Data
desc: Reserve Bank of India monetary data.

name: SBA Loans
desc: Small Business Admin loan distribution records.

name: SCF
desc: Survey of Consumer Finances wealth study.

name: SHARE
desc: Survey of Health, Ageing and Retirement in Europe.

name: SIPP
desc: Survey of Income and Program Participation.

name: TRAC
desc: Transactional Records Access Clearinghouse enforcement data.

name: UCR (FBI)
desc: Uniform Crime Reporting agency level data.

name: UKCPR Welfare Data
desc: University of Kentucky Center for Poverty Research indicators.

name: CBO (Congressional Budget Office)
desc: U.S. Congressional Budget Office. Budget, economic, and demographic projections with downloadable tables/data in support of fiscal and macro analysis.
vars: Deficit, Federal Debt, Spending/Revenue projections, GDP and labor market projections
papers: CBO Budget and Economic Outlook (various years)

name: Census Bureau (USA) - Data
desc: U.S. Census Bureau data portal covering population, housing, business, geography, and program statistics (including major surveys and administrative series).
vars: ACS, CPS (via Census), Population/Housing, Business & economic statistics, Geography

name: USDA ERS (Economic Research Service) - Data Products
desc: USDA Economic Research Service data products for agriculture, food, rural economy, environment, and related policy topics, with downloadable series and documentation.
vars: Farm income, Commodity prices, Food expenditures, Rural indicators

name: EPA Climate Change Indicators (USA)
desc: EPA’s climate change indicators program: curated indicators and figures documenting observed long-term trends and impacts in the United States, with technical documentation and report downloads.
vars: Temperature, Sea level, Drought, Heat waves, Wildfires, Greenhouse gases (selected indicators)
papers: Climate Change Indicators in the United States (Fifth Edition)

name: NCES (National Center for Education Statistics)
desc: U.S. federal education statistics agency collecting and reporting data on the condition of U.S. education from early childhood through adult education, including surveys, longitudinal studies, and institutional data.
vars: CCD, NAEP, IPEDS, ECLS, HSLS, NPSAS, B&B (and other NCES programs)
papers: NCES Digest of Education Statistics (various years)

name: NCHS (National Center for Health Statistics)
desc: CDC’s National Center for Health Statistics: major U.S. health surveys and vital statistics, including public-use data and documentation for population health and mortality research.
vars: NHANES, vital statistics (births/deaths), mortality, health survey series (varies)
papers: NCHS Data Briefs and Survey Documentation (various)

name: BJS (Bureau of Justice Statistics)
desc: U.S. Bureau of Justice Statistics: criminal justice data and analysis including surveys and administrative series on crime, corrections, courts, and law enforcement.

name: BTS (Bureau of Transportation Statistics)
desc: U.S. Bureau of Transportation Statistics: transportation system statistics and data products across modes, supporting transport/urban/regional analysis.
vars: Travel activity, Freight, Safety, System performance indicators (varies)

name: USA Trade Online (U.S. Census Bureau)
desc: U.S. Census Bureau tool for creating custom reports and downloading current and historical U.S. export and import trade data by commodity and partner dimensions.
vars: Exports/imports by HS/commodity, partner country, port (varies)

name: World Bank Microdata Library
desc: World Bank microdata catalog providing access to survey microdata (e.g., household and related studies) with metadata and documentation supporting development and policy research.
vars: Household surveys and related microdata (varies; includes LSMS and other programs)

name: WTO Data Portal
desc: World Trade Organization data portal for trade and tariff-related indicators and downloads across countries, products, and time.
vars: Merchandise trade, services trade, tariffs and related indicators (varies)
papers: WTO World Trade Statistical Review (various years)

name: Pacific Exchange Rate Service (PERS)
desc: Academic exchange-rate data service (UBC Sauder) providing historical exchange rate series commonly used in international finance and macro research.
vars: Daily exchange rates and cross rates (varies by currency and period)

name: NBER Data
desc: National Bureau of Economic Research public-use data archive and reference datasets used widely in applied macro, finance, labor, and econometrics.
vars: Public-use reference datasets and links (varies by topic/series)
